title: Record, Rewind
description: The last person in the world Cassie Bell wants to see is Damien Colton, the lead singer of the blazing hot band, The Hollow Men. Not because she doesn’t like him, but because she’s liked him ever since they went to high school together. Back then they were both rising stars, but only Damien made it, and he never guessed she had a crush on him. And why should he? She was so shy in high school she couldn’t even bring herself to speak to him.But when Damien walks into her elevator and insists on taking a smoke break with her on the roof of the hotel where she cleans rooms for a living, it seems fate has brought them back together. And when the door leading back into the building locks behind them, it seems fate likes to play a good prank.Can Cassie ever overcome her shyness and confess to Damien the torch she’s carried for years, or have the years since high school changed them both too dramatically for them to ever have a second chance?-------------This 24,000 word romance novella is sweet with heat, and all about tight spots and second chances!
author: Ava Lore
